::Orchestra::

Orchestra tried to use his quick-thinking again.

"Well, we may be able to enhance the technology in it of containing a spark.
You see, we might be able to make it so that the container can even modify
the spark, or heal it.  We can add extra features like that.  And a whole
bunch more complex activities may be done with it," Orchestra said.
